name.namePart: Center for the Study of Liberal Education for Adults

mods.abstract: Titles from the monograph series: Bachelor Of Liberal Studies: Development Of A Curriculum At The University of Oklahoma; Never Too Late For College The Brooklyn Degree Program For Adults; Metroplex Assembly: An Experiment In Community Education; Reorientation In Labor Education A Symposium On Liberal Education for Labor in the University; Changing Patterns In Continuing Education For Business; University Adult Education In The Arts- A descriptive view of programs; A Conspectus To The Self-Study Project Of University College- the University of Chicago; The Audience For Liberal Adult Education; Creativity Research And Its Implications For Adult Education
